announcements.title: Join the AuraFX community!
announcements.message:
Share your effects, request features, or just hang out with other creators.
We’re growing fast, and your feedback matters.

📌 Discord: https://discord.gg/4B8rGgzu

announcements.title: 3D Editor
announcements.message: Various bug fixes were made in the 3D editor and the UI was renewed.
